summary: The Department of Education gives grants to schools and organizations to help disadvantaged students—including students with disabilities—prepare for, enroll in, and graduate from college. The Student Support Services program is its only college access program whose target population specifically includes students with disabilities. But Education does not collect complete information about the disability status of the students helped through the program. As a result, it...
title: Department of Education: Additional Data Collection Would Help Assess the Performance of a Program Supporting College Students with Disabilities
